summary: This document is an FBI interview summary (302 form) with an unnamed female witness, likely a model, regarding her interactions with Jeffrey Epstein and his associates. The witness describes scheduling massages, receiving gifts and travel arrangements from Epstein, observations of his assistants and other girls, and an incident where Epstein was violent with another individual. The interview was conducted with her attorneys Gloria Allred and Marianne Wong present.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Present during the FBI interview of the witness in Los Angeles.

persons.name: Marianne Wong
persons.context: Present during the FBI interview of the witness in Los Angeles.

persons.name: Dan Mullkoff
persons.context: Participated in the witness interview via telephone conference.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure described by the witness. She details interactions including scheduling massages, receiving gifts/travel from him, his comments about assistants, and an incident where he was violent with another person.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as having her name on travel tickets for the witness and being a friend of Epstein. The witness saw notepads with her name but never met her.

connections.description: Maxwell is described as a friend of Epstein and was involved in booking travel for individuals associated with him.
Both were attorneys present representing the witness during her FBI interview.
Epstein provided the witness with gifts (laptop, roses), arranged travel, and sent her money via Western Union.

events.title: Planned trip to Epstein's island
events.description: The witness was supposed to go to Jeffrey Epstein's island but could not because she had shows.

events.title: Epstein's violent incident
events.description: The witness describes an incident where Epstein was violent about forcing another person (referred to as 'her') in a hallway. The witness saw this and Epstein later bragged about it.

events.title: Victoria's Secret errand
events.description: Epstein instructed the witness or an assistant to get white lingerie from Victoria's Secret. The witness had to try it on in a staircase, and Epstein had a camera.

events.title: FBI interview
events.description: The witness was interviewed in Los Angeles by law enforcement with her attorneys present.

keyFacts: The witness describes Jeffrey Epstein as 'the center of universe' and details a routine where assistants would schedule appointments for massages.
The witness recounts an incident where Epstein was violent with another individual in a hallway and later bragged about it.
Epstein and his associates arranged travel for the witness, including tickets where Ghislaine Maxwell's name appeared on the booking.
Epstein offered to help the witness get into Harvard by claiming he knew the President and could get a recommendation letter, contingent on her 'earning grades'.
The witness's passport was scanned on at least two occasions: once by Epstein's staff in the U.S. and once by a house manager at his Paris apartment.
